name: Crab-Filled Tortillas With Avocado Sauce
keywords: avocado, corn tortillas, crab meat, jalapeño, salad greens, tomato, zucchini, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 cups lump crab meat, picked over for shells
1 small red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, toss together the zucchini, crab meat, jalapenos, onion, 2 tablespoons cilantro, lime zest and juice, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt and pepper. Set aside. Place the avocado, yogurt and remaining salt in a food processor and pulse to produce a coarse puree.

Steam the tortillas until softened. Place a heaping 1/4 cup of the crab mixture in the center of each one and roll the tortilla around it. Divide the greens among 4 plates and place 2 of the tortillas on each plate. Top with a large dollop of the avocado sauce, sprinkle with the tomatoes and remaining cilantro and serve.
